name: Smooth transition into UX Design - Anfisa B. [fof_athens #5]
description:
Anfisa is a User-Centered Product Designer with an entrepreneurial mindset and passion to help creatives. 


Since 2012 Anfisa has developed a strong passion for building products. In fact, in the last 9 years, she's built 3 startups and worked as a freelance for companies like NCR Corp., Storyhunter, Connectpay, Aerum, and others. 


Currently, she is working as a Senior User Experience Designer at Citrix, focusing on the employee's productivity and workspace.


Also, since 2016 Anfisa taught UX fundamentals to 1000+ students at www.uxforfreelancers.com. 


As a side project, she is also running a UX blog and a podcast.


In her speech, Anfisa will guided us on a smooth transition into UX design, through practical talk full of exercises and action points.
